dcterms:creator: J. Colyar
J. Halkias
dcterms:description: The NGSIM dataset stands as a rich repository of vehicle trajectory information, documenting traffic patterns along the eastbound I-80 in the San Francisco Bay area and the southbound US 101 in Los Angeles. This dataset offers a vivid portrayal of real-world highway scenarios, providing an intricate understanding of vehicular movements.
dcterms:title: NGSIM dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Colyar
J. Halkias
dcterms:description: The NGSIM dataset includes vehicle trajectory data from the US Highway 80, providing insights into traffic behavior and vehicle interactions.
dcterms:title: NGSIM dataset
